definition: simple/uncomplicated/letter/to choose/to select/bamboo strips used for writing (old)
to weave/to plait/to organize/to group/to arrange/to edit/to compile/to write/to compose/to fabricate

sentences.english: Jane made up stories to amuse her little brother .
sentences.chinese: 简编故事逗她的小弟弟。

sentences.english: The compendium represents an indispensable review of key work in the area.
sentences.chinese: 简编代表着该地区的重点工作不可缺少的审查。

definition: variant of 帙[zhi4]/variant of 秩[zhi4]/(classifier) ten years
twenty four dynastic histories (or 25 or 26 in modern editions)/same as 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3]
interpreting words/to explain the meaning of words in classic texts/to decipher an old script
booklet/brochure/(old) book (made of bamboo strips tied together)
to compose (a piece of writing)/to write/(written) work/writer
